Key Match Events: Bellingham (13') scored the first goal for England
Endrick (80') scored the winning goal for Brazil
Paqueta (34') scored a goal for Brazil
Pre-Game Insights: England are not without their own fitness doubts too, but the Three Lions have never lost a home friendly under Southgate
A patched-up squad on an underwhelming run of form are facing an uphill battle to match their predecessors' results against the Three Lions
England are on a 10-match unbeaten run since their World Cup 2022 campaign ended at the hands of France
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Wembley Stadium
The match was a friendly between England and Brazil
The match was part of England's preparations for Euro 2024
Others: Kobbie Mainoo, Jarrad Branthwaite, Anthony Gordon, and Ezri Konsa were all uncapped players in the England squad
Alisson Becker was out of contention for Brazil due to a thigh issue
